Text.Page: You went on a patrol near Mathar Spire, climbed a cliffside, and then jumped, only to land light as a feather. When you reported back to Jorhon, he declared you fully trained and fit for duty.

It is time for you to prove yourself, .

Gyebrik, child of Karas, guards the eastern approach to Tower Base. Meet with him while I report on your progress to Jorhon.

A new recruit approaches, and a task is at hand. This coincidence bodes well for your future.

Each day, we patrol the area around Mathar Spire, and harvest flowers on its heights. They are used to make a very special potion, and we have installed an obelisk to protect the area."What exactly are you asking me?"

Is it not obvious? {@linkcreature:13#301194#Stonebeaks} have damaged the obelisk, and consumed pieces of it. Get them back, repair the obelisk, and harvest the flower. Do this, and Gyebrik, child of Karas, will gladly endorse you as a full member of the garrison.

Those who dawdle after picking the flower will also need this featherlight potion. Use it only when the time is right.

(As you replace the shards,the obelisk lights up. Seems to be working.)

(Now, climb those vines ahead.)
(It seems like you need more shards.)

When I sent you for training, I expected you back before now.

Well, what have you to say for yourself?"I've completed my patrol, Sir."

Ah, a Skyreach Flower. You have indeed.

Well, , you've definitely completed your training to my satisfaction. Congratulations! You are now a full member of our garrison. And I think it's time you dress the part...
